mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DETAIL, PRICE, STOCK FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM(ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DETAIL, PRICE, STOCK) VALUES (#{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{itemDetail}, #{price}, #{stock})
mapper.update: update item set item_name=#{itemName}, item_detail=#{itemDetail}, price=#{price}, stock=#{stock} where item_no=#{itemNo}
